item.title: Terri add a quote by Bill Keane
item.description: "Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, today is a gift of God, which is why we call it the present." -- Bill Keane

item.title: Terri add a quote by Emily Dickinson
item.description: "Dogs are better than human beings because they know but do not tell." -- Emily Dickinson

item.title: Terri add a quote by Bessie Anderson Stanley
Terri add a quote by Ilona Andrews
Terri add a quote by J.D. Robb
item.description: "Why are you always smiling? What do you know?" -- J.D. Robb

item.title: Terri add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Terri add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Terri add a quote by Oswald Chambers
item.description: "God does not give us overcoming life; He gives us life as we overcome." -- Oswald Chambers

item.title: Terri add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Terri add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Friendship is born at that moment when one man says to another: "What! You too? I thought that no one but myself . . .&#34;" -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Terri add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "I find television very educating. Every time somebody turns on the set, I go into the other room and read a book." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Terri add a quote by Elizabeth Jane Howard
item.description: "A rainy day is like a lovely gift -- you can sleep late and not feel guilty." -- Elizabeth Jane Howard

item.title: Terri add a quote by Kelly Moran
item.description: "I can take two people, throw a world of obstacles at them, defy the odds, and still give them a happily-ever-after. Together. I am a romance author. What's your superpower?" -- Kelly Moran
